channel.title: Pilotlight - Self-directed support - Case studies SDS and dementia Dementia Younger Onset Early Onset

item.title: Pilotlight Living Well Characters
item.description:
Who is it for? 
The Pilotlight Living Well Characters are for anyone supporting learning and development around self-directed support and younger onset dementia.
What does it do? 

The Pilotlight Living Well Characters are fictional characters based on common characteristics of people with younger onset dementia.

How can you use it? 
The Pilotlight Living Well Characters can be used as case studies in learning and development activities. They can be used to design how self-directed support could work for people with younger onset dementia.
item.dc:creator: Josie Vallely
